PHRASE.LANG: Having studied the esoteric design of the Samurai and Geisha Bots, Iron Fusion's scientists have created the next generation of transforming robots. Unlike their predecessors the Mechjets, Panthabots are able to alter their form at will. [#Legal]

Après avoir étudié les designs ésotériques des robots Samourai et Geisha, les scientifiques de Iron Fusion ont créé la nouvelle génération de robots. Contrairement à leurs prédécesseurs, les Mechjets, les Panthabots peuvent altérer leur forme à loisir. [#Legal]

Nach dem sie das esoterische Design der Samurai- und Geisha-Bots studiert hatten, schufen die Wissenschaftler von Iron Fusion die nächste Generation transformierbarer Roboter. Im Gegensatz zu ihren Vorgängern, den Mechjets, können Panthabots ihre Gestalt beliebig verändern. [#Legal]

Dopo aver studiato il design esoterico dei robot Samurai e Geisha, gli scienziati di Iron Fusion hanno creato la nuova generazione di robot che si trasformano. Diversamente dai suoi predecessori Mechjet, i Panthabot sono capaci di cambiare forma quando vogliono. [#Legal]

Tras haber estudiado el esotérico diseño de los robots samurái y geishas, los científicos de Fusión del Hierro han creado la nueva generación de robots que se transforman. A diferencia de sus predecesores los mecajets, los pantebots pueden cambiar de forma cuando quieren. [#Legal]
사무라이와 게이샤 봇의 난해한 디자인을 연구한 아이언 퓨전의 과학자들이 차세대 변형 로봇을 제작했습니다. 앞선 모델인 메크제트와는 달리, 팬사봇들은 본인 마음대로 모습을 바꿀 수 있답니다. [#Legal]

Having studied the esoteric design of the Samurai and Geisha Bots, Iron Fusion's scientists have created the next generation of transforming robots. Unlike their predecessors the Mechjets, Panthabots are able to alter their form at will. [#Legal]
Iron Fusion的科學家研究武士機器人和藝妓機器人的機密設計後，創造出下一代的變形機器人。豹族機器人和舊款的機甲噴射裝不同，現在能夠隨意變化外觀。 [#Legal]
Iron Fusion的科學家研究武士機器人和藝妓機器人的機密設計後，創造出下一代的變形機器人。豹族機器人和舊款的機甲噴射裝不同，現在能夠隨意變化外觀。 [#Legal]

Having studied the esoteric design of the Samurai and Geisha Bots, Iron Fusion's scientists have created the next generation of transforming robots. Unlike their predecessors the Mechjets, Panthabots are able to alter their form at will. [#Legal]
Forme Tigre à dents de sabre.
Forma di tigre dai denti a sciabola
